All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AcceptDeclineActivity
 
Admin
Represents an Admin user who manages events in the application.
AdminEventAdapter
Adapter for displaying events in a RecyclerView.
AdminEventAdapter.AdminEventClickListener
Interface for handling event click actions.
AdminHomepageActivity
The AdminHomepageActivity class represents the homepage for admin users.
AdminViewEditEventsActivity
The AdminViewEditEventsActivity class allows admin users to view and edit events.
AdminViewEditFacilitiesActivity
The AdminViewEditFacilitiesActivity class allows admin users to view and edit facilities.
AdminViewEditProfilesActivity
The AdminViewEditProfilesActivity class allows admin users to view and edit entrant profiles.
AdminViewEventsContent
The AdminViewEventsContent class displays the details of a selected event and allows admin users to delete it.
AdminViewFacilitiesContent
 
AdminViewProfilesContent
 
AfterSampling
Activity displayed after sampling process is completed.
AvatarUtils
 
DatabaseHelper
A helper class to manage Firestore database operations for event entrant locations.
DatabaseHelper.EntrantLocation
Data class to represent an entrant's location.
DatabaseHelper.EntrantLocationsCallback
Callback interface to handle entrant location data retrieval.
DatabaseManager
Manages database operations for the Lottery App using Firebase Firestore.
DatabaseManager.EntrantsFetchCallback
Callback interface for fetching entrants.
DBManagerEvent
Manages database operations related to events using Firebase Firestore.
DBManagerEvent.EntrantsUpdateCallback
Callback interface for entrants update operations.
DBManagerEvent.GetEventCallback
Callback interface for retrieving a single event.
Entrant
The Entrant class represents an entrant user in the application.

Event
The Event class represents an event with details such as the event name, date, geolocation requirement, number of attendees, description, waiting list, and a generated QR code.

EventAdapter.OnEventClickListener
 
EventInvitationAdapter
 
EventInvitationAdapter.EventViewHolder
 
EventInvitationAdapter.OnEventClickListener
 
Facility
The Facility class represents a facility managed by an organizer.
FacilityAdapter
The FacilityAdapter class is an adapter for displaying a list of facilities in a RecyclerView.
FacilityAdapter.FacilityClickListener
 
FacilityAdapter.FacilityViewHolder
 
FacilityDatabase
The FacilityDatabase class provides methods to interact with the Firestore database for saving and retrieving Facility objects.

FacilityDatabase.GetFacilityCallback

LocationHelper.LocationCallback
A simple callback interface to handle location results.
MainActivity
The MainActivity class represents the main entry point of the application.
MapActivity
The MapActivity class is responsible for displaying the user's current location on a Google Map.

NotificationService
 
Organizer
